title: Sizzling paprika beef with peppers and broccoli
time: Takes 15 minutes to make, 15 minutes to cook
description: An extremely tasty sizzling paprika beef with peppers and broccoli stir-fry supper that contains two of your five a day.
ingredients: 2 x 320g beef rump steaks, cut into thin strips
3 tbsp kecap manis (from Sainsburyâ€™s and Asian food shops), plus extra for drizzling
Small handful fresh coriander leaves, to serve

method.Step 1: Put the steak in a bowl and toss well with the kecap manis. Set aside for 15 minutes while you prepare the other ingredients.

method.Step 2: Bring a medium pan of water to the boil, add the broccoli and cook for a few minutes until just tender. Drain and arrange the broccoli in a serving dish.

method.Step 3: Place a heavy-based frying pan or wok over a high heat, add the oil and heat until smoking. Swiftly add the onion and peppers and toss in the pan for just a few minutes until they are beginning to soften.

method.Step 4: Sprinkle over the chilli, garlic and paprika and quickly toss together. Add the steak and any marinade in the bowl and continue to cook for just 2 minutes until the steak is browned and cooked, adding about 3-4 tbsp water towards the end of cooking.

method.Step 5: Spoon the pan contents over the broccoli, including all the pan juices, scatter with coriander and serve immediately with rice and extra kecap manis to drizzle over.
